Once upon a time, Brian wrote :

>     Also- I noticed this repo has about an 8K bandwidth.  Is there a way
>     I can put this behind the others, so I don't hammer it for things
>     that are at other repos?  I'm respectful about bandwidth, having
>     lived on dialup for so long.  Now I'm on fiber optic and it's a whole
>     other world...

Sure, just use "os" and "updates" from apt.freshrpms.net for instance then
add the lines for that repository with only the module you want/need (here
it's "testing73" I guess).

Matthias
